Name: photostructure
Overview: [b]PhotoStructure is your new home for all your photos and videos.[/b]

Web UI.Name: Web UI
Web UI.Description: Port to access the HTTP UI. Can be modified by setting the PS_HTTP_PORT environment variable.

User ID.Name: User ID
User ID.Description:
This is the userid that PhotoStructure will run under, instead of the default of root (userid 0).

Files copied into your library will be owned by this userid.

Group ID.Name: Group ID
Group ID.Description: This is the groupid that PhotoStructure will run under.

TZ.Name: TZ
TZ.Description: Setting the default timezone helps PhotoStructure infer captured-at time for assets that are missing timezone metadata.

Logging level.Name: Logging level
Logging level.Description: Valid values are debug, info, warn, and error. Default is error, which (should be) quiet.

Library.Name: Library
Library.Description: This is where your PhotoStructure Library will be stored. It needs to have sufficient free space to hold preview images, and transcoded videos.

Temp/Scratch disk.Name: Temp/Scratch disk
Temp/Scratch disk.Description: This needs to be fast, local disk.

Logs.Name: Logs
Logs.Description: Logfiles will be written into this directory. Set environment variable

System config.Name: System config
System config.Description: System configuration is written into this directory.
